scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run webpack && npm run copy-libs-to-public
scripts.compile: npm run compile:cjs && npm run compile:esm
scripts.compile:cjs: tsc -p tsconfig.json --target es5 --module commonjs --outDir src/cjs/ && npm run copy-src-to-public
scripts.compile:esm: tsc -p tsconfig.json --target ES2015 --module ESNext --outdir src/esm/ --moduleResolution node
scripts.webpack: npm run webpack:dev && npm run webpack:prod
scripts.webpack:dev: npx webpack --env=development --config webpack.config.js && npm run copy-dist-to-public
scripts.webpack:prod: npx webpack --env=production --config webpack.config.js && npm run copy-dist-to-public
scripts.copy-libs-to-public: npm run clear-libs && npm run copy-lib-alloyfinger &&  npm run copy-lib-earcut && npm run copy-lib-ngdg && npm run copy-lib-plotboilerplate && npm run copy-lib-threejs && npm run copy-lib-thee-slice
scripts.clear-libs: rm -rf public/lib/alloyfinger-typescript && rm -rf earcut-typescript && rm -rf public/lib/ngdg && rm -rf public/lib/plotboilerplate && rm -rf public/lib/three && rm -rf public/lib/threejs-slice-geometry-typescript
scripts.copy-lib-ngdg: mkdir public/lib/ngdg/ && cp -R ./src/ public/lib/ngdg/src/ && cp -R ./dist/ public/lib/ngdg/dist/
scripts.copy-lib-plotboilerplate: mkdir public/lib/plotboilerplate/ && cp -R node_modules/plotboilerplate/src public/lib/plotboilerplate/src && cp -R node_modules/plotboilerplate/dist public/lib/plotboilerplate/dist
scripts.copy-lib-threejs: mkdir public/lib/three/ && mkdir public/lib/three/build/ && cp node_modules/three/build/three.min.js public/lib/three/build/three.min.js
